set terminal postscript eps enhanced
set output 'smooth-conv.eps'
set size 0.7, 0.7
set logscale x
set logscale y
set grid
set key right bottom
set xlabel 'Degrees of Freedom'
set ylabel 'Error [%]'
plot '-' w lp linetype 1 pointtype 7 title 'h-refinement, p = 1', '-' w lp linetype 1 pointtype 9 title 'h-refinement, p = 2',  '-' w lp linetype 1 pointtype 3 title 'h-refinement, p = 3', '-' w lp linetype 1 pointtype 5 title 'p-refinement'
